products.title: Faux Suede White Curtain
products.metadescription: Faux Suede White Curtain in White. Made to measure from £21.56 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Curtain includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our Faux Suede range of fabric has proven to be one of our most popular roman blinds and curtains for many years. Still, at the forefront of fashion, the fabric makes sumptuous Roman blinds and curtains. 
 The Faux Suede White curtain in a lovely colour is an excellent way to transform your home at an affordable price. 
 
 Product ID: DB-CUR0017 Fabric Colour: White Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Light Filtering Poly/Cotton Blended Lining     Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Increase to ER3 (High) By Adding Thermal Lining Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Velvet Canvas Cream Curtain
products.metadescription: Velvet Canvas Cream Curtain in Cream. Made to measure from £24.42 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Curtain includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our soft-touch range of velvet fabrics add a touch of luxury and softness to your home. A multi-tonal fabric, our smooth velvet fabrics create depth when catching the light, and can create different looks depending on the time of day. From cosy winter mornings, to breezy summers, velvet fabrics have been a firm staple in home and fashion since the 1920s and 70s.
 This soft curtain in Canvas Cream, adds a warm neutral hue to your home. A light cream shade creates feeling of calm and warmth, this velvet cream curtain creates a decadent look for a fraction of the price on the high street. 
 At Swift Direct Blinds, not only is this curtain made by the experts at our Yorkshire factory, but with over 50 years experience, our curtains are made to last. Our curtains come with five year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, and customer-first service! 
 
 Product ID: DB-CUR1246 Fabric Colour: Canvas Cream Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Light Filtering Poly/Cotton Blended Lining     Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Increase to ER3 (High) By Adding Thermal Lining Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Galaxy Glacier White Curtain
products.metadescription: Galaxy Glacier White Curtain in White. Made to measure from £29.04 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Curtain includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
If you like a serene and simple feel to your living space, then the Galaxy Glacier White Curtain is ideal. The white fabric features a defined woven texture with sparkly metallic yarns within the weave and is great for layering and softening your scheme. This strong weave gives the fabric a raw, canvas effect that is perfect for a neutral, organic inspired living space.
 
  Product ID: DB-CUR1146 Fabric Colour: Glacier White Material: 60% Polyester 40% Viscose Lining: Light Filtering Poly/Cotton Blended Lining     Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Increase to ER3 (High) By Adding Thermal Lining Light Filtering: Yes

products.title: Banbury Canvas Curtain
products.metadescription: Banbury Canvas Curtain in Cream. Made to measure from £32.77 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Curtain includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Subtle and stylish, this curtain is ideal for enhancing a neutral scheme. The Banbury Canvas Curtain features a clean geometric pattern of overlapping lines creating a dimensional woven effect. This design will suit a contemporary scheme or a more classic setting and features a full lining that is sure to give an elegant, quality look to the fabric.

products.productdescription:
Enjoy a dash of contemporary glamour with the Windsor Canvas Curtain. Made from a sleek cotton-blend fabric and beautifully enhanced with strands of metallic yarn in a soft and curving motif, this curtain is sure to sparkle at your window. The pale neutral toned fabric is backed with a full lining, enhancing the look and quality of this curtain.

products.productdescription:
The fully lined Ascot Canvas Curtain features a gentle motif of vines that has a soft and contemporary feel thanks to the cool grey hue of the background fabric. The pattern is picked out in elegant embroidery and is a great way to soften the look of a modern interior with textiles.
